choices: Give me other media to work with!
1.content:
On the outside, the Reality Changing Camera (or RCC) looked like a typical polaroid camera from a couple of decades ago. No one can say for sure when it first came into existence, though. One prevailing theory was that it had been here all along, since the beginning of time, but that the intense desires of many anime fans to have their own personal harem had focused its power into something rather deviant. Others say it was actually the other way around, with the first person to use the RCC creating the very first harem.

As a photo was taken, a bright flash always followed, and the image spit out by the camera would reflect the new reality. Naturally, as a harem creator, those transformed would have some type of feelings for the user of the camera, regardless of whether they had any before the picture was taken. Even a completely stranger would develop a new relationship with the user based on what transformation they had, which itself was determined by how the camera read into the user's desires. No barrier was too great for the RCC as it transformed men into women with ease.

The camera itself was sometimes a fickle being, assuming it always knew what the user wanted. Oftentimes, they would be unaware of the changes that had happened after taking a photo, and simply lived the rest of their lives much happier with a potential new love interest. For the subset of people that understood the results, it became more complicated. Some made sure to use and abuse the camera's power until the day they died or accidentally transformed themselves and lost their awareness. Certainly, some immediately used the camera on themselves on purpose, changing their form to something more pleasing, but this often lead to a desparate desire for a master, a new user to take control of the camera so that they could belong to their very own harem.

As with anything somewhat sentient and supernatural, however, the RCC had its own twisted sense of humor. If it felt particularly nasty towards a certain user, it could turn subjects into a trope they found rather undesirable- or worse yet, it could manipulate its way into the hands of a new user, and transform the old user!

The RCC had gone for some time without a user, and as such, was ready to make itself known to the multiverse once more. The place that this camera eventually ended up turned out to be...

info.brief_description: Turn characters from your favorite worlds into harem girl stereotypes.
info.description:
An otherworldly camera exists that has the ability to turn subjects into a girl straight out of a harem anime. Affects men and women alike!

Want to turn that developed female lead into a Tsundere? Change that down-to-earth best friend into a haughty Ojou-type princess? Or how about just introducing more catgirls into your life? The camera covers all these needs and more! Just take that shot, and the camera will mold the subject into a trope befitting the user's deepest desires. NOTE: Depending on the whims of the camera, the user may or may not be aware of changes after taking a photo.

Already got a harem? Feel free to use this device and tweak someone's personality and body as needed!

WARNING: Take selfies at your own risk!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Based off of a great thread by Kanddon: http://old.bearchive.com/~addventure/game1/docs/1326/1326547.html

I'm listing the rating as 18+, but feel free to make chapters that are PG-13 or whatever makes you comfortable.

If your chapter has poor spelling/grammar issues, I'm probably going to edit and fix them :)

I'm going to give out 500 GPs to the first 30 high-quality chapters that get added. That means a chapter that actually has some length to it (200+ words), NOT for chapters that simply branch out possible story ideas/options.

Here's a good resource on common character types in a harem: https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/HaremGenre
